content:
EntityDescription Class

Definition

This represent the base abstract class for all the entity Description classes. Mainly contain the read-only mechanics. This class is not meant to be used or inherited by external customers.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract(Namespace="http://schemas.microsoft.com/netservices/2010/10/servicebus/connect")]
[System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownType(typeof(Microsoft.Azure.NotificationHubs.NotificationHubDescription))]
public abstract class EntityDescription : System.Runtime.Serialization.IExtensibleDataObject
Inheritance
Object
EntityDescription
Derived
NotificationHubDescription
NotificationHubJob
PnsCredential
RegistrationDescription
Attributes
System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract System.Runtime.Serialization.KnownType

Properties

ExtensionData

Gets or sets the structure that contains extra data.
IsReadOnly

Indicate if the instance is read-only mode.

Methods

ThrowIfReadOnly()

Throw if the read only bool is set.
